author: @bin4ry_d3struct0r
text: My first jobs in tech were in the roles of support. It was highly stressful and thankless work. Recently, I joined a small core team to develop our in-house LLM to replace ChatGPT usage. One of my end goals is not to replace our tech support staff but to help them. As such, I am very interested in transfer learning and fine tuning transformers because I'll be doing exactly that very soon from now.
